detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mtable columnalign="left" rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em">
    <mtr>
      <mtd>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mi>b</mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
          <mn>10</mn>
        </mrow>
      </mtd>
    </mtr>
    <mtr>
      <mtd>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mi>c</mi>
          <mo>=</mo>
          <mn>10</mn>
          <msqrt>
            <mn>2</mn>
          </msqrt>
        </mrow>
      </mtd>
    </mtr>
  </mtable>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}   {b = 10} \\    {c = 10\sqrt 2 }  \end{array}</annotation></semantics></math>
